skillTree.name: Haunter of the Dark
skillTree.description: The ultimate in moving targets; being neither ghost nor revenant, Mournguls use their not-quite-real state to better resist missile fire.

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: You'd better kill this one or they'll keep coming back until one of you is dead. Even then, there's no guarantee it'll be over!

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: The Killing Cold
skillTree.description: Run true, for the frozen terror cometh; the Mourngul radiates a deathly chill that slows enemies, allowing it to go in for the kill.

skillTree.name: Insatiable Hunger
skillTree.description: An eternity of maddening hunger, from which there can be no release. It doesn't stop the Mourngul from trying, however.

skillTree.name: Materialise
skillTree.description: From 'neath the swirling mist the Mourngul rises, bringing a terrible icy death in its dreadful wake.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -5

skillTree.name: Evanesce
skillTree.description: "…and like that it was gone. Along with the village and its inhabitants… Ne'er to be seen - or heard of - again."

skillTree.name: Monkey Jacket
skillTree.description: "Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"

skillTree.name: Ravenous Attack
skillTree.description: An all-but-unstoppable terror, when the Mournguls descend they rend and devour yet never know satisfaction.

skillTree.name: Master Strike
skillTree.description: Strike true; strike hard.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Devourer of All
skillTree.description: The Mourngul's insatiable appetite gives a further boost to its ravening slaughter.

skillTree.name: Carnophage
skillTree.description: For every wound the Mourngul inflicts in combat, it can regenerate its own injuries.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Wild-Eyed
skillTree.description: "Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Ravenous
skillTree.description: Vicious, and without remorse, the haunter seeks fresh victims.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 when in foreign territory

skillTree.name: Ghastly
skillTree.description: Everyone has heard the stories, but few have actually encountered a Mourngul Haunter and lived to tell of it.

skillTree.name: Frigid Air
skillTree.description: The biting cold you feel? Isn't just the wind.

skillTree.name: Specter
skillTree.description: Even the bravest find their steps falter, their voice hushed in fear.

skillTree.name: Hideous Grin
skillTree.description: Mirthless, and unending. A consequence of its agonizing death.

skillTree.name: Wretched
skillTree.description: The foulest creatures in the new world, and the old.

skillTree.name: Hunters in the Dark
skillTree.description: They will descend like a pack of ravenous wolves, and tear their victims to pieces.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -10% for Mournguls units

skillTree.name: Tough as Nails
skillTree.description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

skillTree.name: Intimidating
skillTree.description: You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.

skillTree.name: Hero
skillTree.description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Bard
skillTree.description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.

skillTree.name: Esteemed Combatant
skillTree.description: You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Trainer
skillTree.description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

skillTree.name: Scavenge
skillTree.description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Spread Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Building
skillTree.description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Dark Majesty
backgroundSkills.description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."

backgroundSkills.name: Devious
backgroundSkills.description: Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

backgroundSkills.name: Dread Incarnate
backgroundSkills.description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

backgroundSkills.name: Lore Keeper
backgroundSkills.description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

backgroundSkills.name: Master of the Black Arts
backgroundSkills.description: A master indeed - to rival the Great Necromancer himself?

ui_effects.description: ➕75% chance to deal 75 direct damage to 1 entity per second

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -10% for all spellcasters

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -8

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
